item.title: Backup and Restore PostgreSQL Database on CentOS 7

item.title: FastAPI Deployment with Docker on CentOS 7
item.description: Firstly, you will need to update your system’s default applications to their latest versions: sudo yum update -y Next, install the necessary utilities for Docker: sudo yum install -y yum-utils device-mapper-persistent-data lvm2 sudo yum-config-manager --add-repo https://download.docker.com/linux/centos/docker-ce.repo sudo yum install -y docker-ce sudo systemctl start docker && sudo systemctl enable docker You’ll also need to install Docker Compose: sudo curl -L "https://github.com/docker/compose/releases/download/1.29.2/docker-compose-$(uname -s)-$(uname -m)" -o /usr/local/bin/docker-compose sudo chmod +x /usr/local/bin/docker-compose Create a Dockerfile that will specify how your application should be built:
